name: janlog-app
description: Janlog - Personal Mahjong Score Management App

scripts.test: npm run test --workspaces && cd backend && python -m pytest
scripts.lint: npm run lint --workspaces && cd backend && python -m flake8 app/ tests/
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && cd backend && find . -type d -name __pycache__ -delete
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspaces && cd backend && pip install -r requirements.txt -r requirements-dev.txt
